title: IWC Melbourne
body:
Will the ticket include a seat or admission to the event?. i want to buy several tickets to go with my friends but i am not sure if it will allocate a seat in the arena.
 {{champion:67}} {{champion:67}} {{item:3157}}

replies.body:
Hey man,

You can check out the IWC Melb Q&A here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/R97lKhpN-international-wild-card-all-stars-melbourne-26-29-nov-qa

Go through the questions already asked as someone else may have already asked your question. If post your question there
